channel.description: CC 410 - Week 6 Wrapping Up 9/27 - Debugging & Logging 9/27 - Lambda Expressions 9/27 - Debugging & Logging Example 9/27 - Restaurant 3 9/27 - Final Project 2 This Week 10/4 - GUI Basics Example 10/4 - Restaurant 4 Milestone 4 GUI Basics Create Overall GUI Structure I Give One Example Read Helpful Hints feel free to get creative Looking Ahead Module 7 - Event-Driven Programming Module 8 - Design Patterns & Combos Module 9 - External Libraries Web APIs, etc.
